alert.note: Alert for Smith; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 8:50PM CDT until September 24 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Smith County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Wood County in northeastern Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 849 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mineola, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tyler, Mineola, Lindale, Quitman, Lake Fork Reservoir, Hoard, Golden, Lake Palestine, Forest Hill, Alba, and Carroll. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
